name: Connie Smith
text: Sometimes you tend to be nervous when it comes to getting taxes done. Though, my experience started rocky, due to my place of my appointment, no one was there. But once I made a phone call, Eric P, a representative in another office, told me to stop by. He made the process easy going, comfortable and and worth the extra drive. I definitely will recommend Jackson Hewitt to others for tax services.

resp.text: Connie, your 5-star review Of Eric P's professional tax services brightens our day. We love hearing he made the process so easy and comfortable after your experience started off a little rocky. Please ask your family and friends about Eric's great tax services, and we look forward to seeing you next tax season. Sonja, Jackson Hewitt Care Team

name: Carlos Lopez
text: I just want to say that out of all the years I have filing taxes and all the places I have tried, Jackson Hewitt was the best, but the reason was because of Mrs. Hope. She is great at her job and her customer service was amazing. I had a lot of paper work for her to do and she made me feel at ease. Hope was amazing I recommend everyone to go to her she will make your filing less stress.

resp.text:
Hello Carlos,

Thank you kindly for the great review of Hope's amazing customer service, how she made you feel at ease, and made filing less stressful!  We look forward to your next visit, please share your great experiences with family and friends!

-Danielle, Jackson Hewitt Care Team

name: Skye Stop
text: I have been filing for 5 years and the last two years they wouldn't give me a cash advance why I made 6 grand.plus they didn't give the second stimulus check until 45 day after everyone else

resp.text:
Thank you for sharing your honest feedback, though I'm sorry to hear of your disappointment regarding the refund advance amount decision made by our underwriter Metabank. It's never our intent to let you down, and though we're not privy to the reasons for their decision, you will have a letter from them with more details within 30 days of your visit. MetaBank considers criteria such as identity verification, IRS repayment history, current status of child support, student loans, tax liens, etc. in factoring their decision, as well as the estimated size of your anticipated tax refund.

Though this explanation may not resolve your frustration, I hope it helps to shed light on the process. If there are any additional concerns you'd like to discuss, please give us a call at 800-234-1040, as we want to ensure any issues are addressed with the attention deserved, and if needed, escalated to the appropriate team to best be of service. We appreciate the review, and look forward to your call if we can further assist. - Jen, Jackson Hewitt Care Team

name: Dominique Jones
text: First of all they sent a check to my bank account that I had already made good on and than had the nerve to say it was my fault because I came in two days later. But even so if you knew that check was sent to my account why wasn’t I told when I came in to pay. They took my money and still let my account be billed for not having the funds available to cover the check. But not to mention the fact that I was told from the beginning that it wasn’t there check that was sent out. Now I’m out of more money than I was before I borrowed the money in the first place.

name: Cynthia Dowdell
text:
Hello Huntsville,
Recently, my daughter and I relocated here so that she can attend college. Now honestly Huntsville, I have met my share of rude people, but I cannot and I will not saying I'll make such a comment towards the two nice ladies who works at Easy Money which is located at 4820 University Drive. I don't understand why their ratings are only 2.7 which is ridiculous! From my personal experience Shenikka and DeDe are the most kind and humble hearted ladies I've met and we've been living here almost one year now. We all know that when you go into an office or business you expect people to become magicians but they work in customer service. And there are some very rude people that can come and expect whatever the situation is it should automatically be okay for them to adjust but it doesn't work that way! You have to be very kind to people if you want them to be kind to you. You have to be humble when you want someone to help you and you would get the same treatment in return. So don't be fooled by this low rating that you see on this Google app because it's not true. These ladies will work with you any kind of way they can and is done without prejudice. So when you go into this store you can ask for either of them and I guarantee you they will be nice, they will be kind, and they will be very understanding of your situation and if they can help you they will. But don't go into the office or any business with a bad attitude oh, because of you bring me a bad attitude you may get one in return depend on the situation. So be very nice and kind to them as you want them to be to you. Don't say something bad about someone just because you had a messed-up situation that could not be fixed so you want to get back at a person by giving them a bad review it doesn't work that way. Be nice and kind and you'll get the same results in return. laser doing a real good job I appreciate you and keep on doing what you doing because you doing good work for this community that's so need you. And if corporate does not appreciate you for the work that you do then maybe they should come and switch places with you to see the type of situation that you deal with everyday because I think you all are doing a hell of a job and from my standpoint from what I see with my own two eyes, keep doing what you doing because your proof in the pudding of good customer service and what it's about. If if corporate does not appreciate you just know that we do parrot God bless you keep up the good work and I'm praying for your safety there it is terrible crisis that we are now in but only temporarily. Thank you very much and God bless you👍💯😘

name: Bre Blanding
text:
If I could rate with no stars I would, but in order to leave a review I have to give this unprofessional establishment one star. I came to this unprofessional establishment today to pay my loan and I was not even greeted , the employee who took my payment had an attitude from the beginning. When I proceeded to leave after I got my payment processed, I believe the manager of the poor establishment made a comment to one of her employees and said “why she looking at me like that “? And I responded by saying who ? She proceeded by saying  “why you looking at me like that “? I responded by saying ,” you looking at me , we made eye contact , I am not looking at you any kind of way calm down” The manager needs to learn some professionalism, even if I was looking at you some type of way why would you say that to an employee? It’s a shame that I cannot even go back to this location because of how I was treated today. The two employees should
Be a shame of themselves. FIND ANOTHER DAY JOB!!!

name: Kelly Ratcliff
text: My fiance and I decided to use this office for his taxes for the 2017 year because we thought they might be able to find him more tax breaks.  Well, they did however, we were definitely scammed!  After seeing that they wanted to charge over $500 for preparing his taxes, the ladies then quickly said they could take off $200 of that price.  We weren't happy with it but since they had already inputed everything we said ok.  So he signed everything and we THOUGHT everything was fine and dandy.  We didn't bother to look at the paperwork when leaving because the women assured us that they had given him a discount.  Well, I go to pick up his check and BOOM...they still charged the OUTRAGEOUS fee!  What the heck?????  After calling and questioning both the manager (who was there that day) and the owner, they still refused because he signed the paperwork...even though they told us it wouldn't be that price.  Guess what folks?! SCAMMERS!  Go get your taxes done SOMEWHERE ELSE!  DO NOT FALL FOR THIS PLACE!!!!!!!!

resp.text: Hello Kelly, oh no! Please have your fiance give us a call at 800-234-1040 as this is never what we want to hear. We would like to look into this further for him.

name: storm hall
text: The only reason I gave them one star is beacuse you have to leave one to leave a Review. They deserve nothing, I went to fill my taxes for the first time as a independent contractor not only did they not tell me I didn't make the threshold to even have to file. They filed my paper work anyway and charged it as the most important form and then took half of my money. 800 they took 400 its important beacuse when I went back to do an amended return that they told me they would do for free. I remember because they had to call corporate and ask what to do. They decided when I went back to charge me a full 175 for something they told me was free. I got upset and left days later when I was forced to retrieve the rest of the amended money I was promised beacuse of other circumstances I gave into my pride and filed not only am I still waiting on my money since January which is unfair. THEY ALSO amended almost a whole 2,000 back from me so yeah I was supposed to have around 2,800 the first time. NOT WORTH IT ALL OF THEM!!. And then when they mess up apparently it's free????? But I was STILL CHARGED lol but I used a prepaid card so that's my small win

resp.text:
Hello Storm,
Thank you for taking the time to leave feedback, though I'm sorry to hear that you found our fees too high. JH tax services come reinforced by a Maximum Refund guarantee along with our Lifetime Accuracy Guarantee & IRS Audit Assistance, because Jackson Hewitt has you covered if ever the need arises. Fees may also differ by location and filing situation, your local JH can best provide a breakdown of charges and the benefits included with this season's filing. We never want to disappoint our clients. If there is anything we can do to rectify your experience, please contact our client care dept. at 1-800-234-1040, and we will do our best to resolve any issues. - Stephanie, Jackson Hewitt Care Team

name: Courtney Ingram
text: They are the only insurance company that you can’t reach. I need to switch my insurance over to my new car but every number that is listed no one answers. I have 5 day’s to get my car insured or the dealership is coming to get it. I have already made my payment for the month. Every other insurance company I called to get a quote answered without a problem even explains how they will come out to the car to get me to sign all the paperwork. I have never had to deal with anything like this and it is very unacceptable and unprofessional, at least tell your clients what to do especially in this time of need. People don’t have money just to throw away. Meaning since I have already paid my insurance for the month but because I can’t get anyone on the phone I will have to go somewhere else to get my car insured and to keep them from coming to get it for something so simple to do. I just want a refund and I will go somewhere else.

resp.text: Hello Courtney, we would like to apologize for your negative experience with our company. We’d like to learn more about your specific situation and make things right. We would greatly appreciate if you could give us your contact information or give us a call at 1-800-300-0227, at your earliest convenience in order to help you solve this situation. We look forward to speaking with you and working towards earning back your business.

name: Tiffany Michael
text:
Edited, 3/19/2020
Still no luck, got a response from the owner to call but the 800 number wasn't for usagncies.

Original review:
Horrible all the way around! First they didn't apply my payment which cancelled my policy and caused me to have a lapse in coverage. Then they want to charge me a fortune to start a new policy because I have a lapse in coverage!?!?!? Next, my VIN number was entered into the computer wrong. The state needs proof of insurance for dates I was with USAgencies and a wrong VIN won't work. I waited the 2-3 days they said it would take to correct it but it never got fixed. I can't get a tag because of their mistake! There's no supervisor in the office and I can't even get anyone to call me back.

resp.text: Hello Tiffany, we would like to apologize for your negative experience with our company. We’d like to learn more about your specific situation and make things right. name: Iceeu (Sonshine)
text:
I had to give a star to review Mr. Parker. My. Parker is the Accountant for my neighborhood's H.O.A. I was relatively new to the neighborhood just buying my home 2 years prior to investigating the H.O.A. I was unable to get any financial information from the only board member so I went to Mr.Parker.
His Secertary was so kind and very helpful and I appreciated that. She told me Mr. Parker was not in the office after returning from an office. I asked her some questions and she went back and forth to the same office with answers to the question's. I them saw a man comes from the office leaving and got on the elevator headed down. I know this today to be Mr.Parker, as she walked past the man was wearing a T-SHIRT advertising his business Bryan L. Parker Accounting. I later sent him emails requesting his presence at our Association meeting, I never received a reply.
I realize that all of this blame doesn't lie solely at Mr.Parkers feet, it lies equally at his feet and that of our Association President's feet. I received contradictory answers for questions I asked. As a homeowner I and my neighbors pay a fee to Mr. Parker and as an employee he should have been able to answer everyone of my questions and he did not. It is my opinion and the opinion of many of my neighbors that Mr. Parker made no effort to assist us with any information at all at several different requests and times. To us that is shady behavior.

resp.text: This post appears to have some misunderstandings. First of all, whoever was seen walking past, if you were told I was not in the office, was not me. We do not have t-shirts advertising our business so I would question if you were even at our office, since you have inaccurate information. Secondly, we are not employees of the HOA, we are contracted by the HOA board to handle certain accounting functions and provide the board with requested reports. Similar to any business, the reports are disseminated from the top (HOA) to those who need to know. Privacy laws are very strict and we try to adhere to them diligently. If you want more access to information of your HOA, I suggest you become a member of the board. As I understand it, several requests have been made for more board participation but thus far there have been no takers. If you become a board member, we would be glad to share appropriate information with you.

name: Brian Brown
text:
Until this year i have not had any issues with Jackson Hewitt on Jordan Lane. My tax documents were brought to them on time yet my taxes have not been filed because they say I must sign a release giving them permission to share my information with their third party affiliates for marketing purposes. Is requiring me to submit to robo calls and unwanted emails just to file my taxes against the law?
Update. After all is said and done guess what? I didn't have to sign away my right to being contacted for marketing purposes by third party affiliates just to file my taxes. Jackson Hewitt just wants you to believe that you have too. My taxes have been filed, late but filed.
Read what your signing folks or companies like Jackson Hewitt will slip in unnecessary documents for their financial gain

resp.text:
Hello Brian

Thank you for choosing Jackson Hewitt!  We enjoy working with you and understand your concerns about third parties.  Due to Federal Regulations we need your signature to file your taxes with the IRS and to utilize a third party financial institution to ensure you receive your refund as fast as possible.  Further as a valued customer we will provide you with dates of our popular Refund Advance and Office openings for the tax season.

You are more than welcome to opt out of the notifications, however we cannot file taxes without a signed agreement for us to share your info with a third party AKA the IRS.

I hope this helps clear things up for you.  Please feel free to call us with any other questions you have at 800-234-1040

Best regards,
Sara
Jackson Hewitt Care Team

name: Misti Nicole Atlanta (MISTI NICOLE ATLANTA)
text: We were referred to Mark William Rogers by another salon professional. We made an appointment. We commuted 2 1/2 hours to have him do our taxes.  From over the phone and all the way through the entire process, he was so calm and professional. Great at explaining everything! I am a small salon owner and now live out of state. He has continued to work with us via fax and email to ensure we get the attention and help we need. He makes sure you are accessing all your deductions. He was well trained and very current on all the rules and regulations. Last year he was slammed as we called way too late, he referred us to Cynthia. She was great! All in all, I highly recommend them. They have literally taken all the stress and anxiety out of our tax season. PLUS----all the knowledge we gained, helped us to be better prepared year after year. Customer since 2014

name: Whitney Jackson
text: I’ve been using Thompson Tax Jackson Hewitt for the past 7 years or so and even though I work out-of-town throughout the year, I’ve continued using them until now! I was audited in 2015 but was relieved when I remembered Thompson tax had an audit guarantee.  I called the office and they told me to submit whatever the IRS was asking for in the letter and to call them back if I received anymore letters or coorespondates . Fast-forward 6 months, 25 letters & 2 warnings, I never received any help from Thompson tax; I sent numerous emails and phone calls but no one in the office was really trying to solve my issue or take accountability in resolving my audit. I was recently in town for a weekend and dropped by the office. The secretary that was in that day said she had no clue about a audit guarantee or what I was even talking about. I ended up talking to one of the tax guys and he informed me it would probably just be best if I paid the almost 5 figure amount they were requesting. Thanks for nothing Thompson Tax, you’ve lost a faithful customer!I’ve been using Thompson Tax Jackson Hewitt for the past 7 years or so and even though I work out-of-town throughout the year, I’ve continued using them until now! I was audited in 2015 but was relieved when I remembered Thompson tax had an audit guarantee.  I called the office and they told me to submit whatever the IRS was asking for in the letter and to call them back if I received anymore letters or correspondents . Fast-forward 6 months, 25 letters & 2 warnings, I never received any help from Thompson tax; I sent numerous emails and phone calls but no one in the office was really trying to solve my issue or take accountability in resolving my audit. I was recently in town for a weekend and dropped by the office. The secretary that was in that day said she had no clue about a audit guarantee or what I was even talking about. I ended up talking to one of the tax guys and he informed me it would probably just be best if I paid the almost 5 figure amount they were requesting. Thanks for nothing Thompson Tax, you’ve lost a faithful customer!

resp.text: Hello Whitney, oh no that is never what we want to hear. We have your back for all your tax needs.  Please contact us at 800-234-1040 so that we can assist you with your concern.

name: James Biits
text:
I am active duty stationed at Gunter.  Usually I get my taxes done at the base but this year a lot of base services are closed.  Every time I called the legal office all I get is we hope it will be open in February.   I couldn’t wait that due to getting surgery soon so I noticed that a Jackson Hewitt was opening at Dalraida Commons. I always go there to shop at Publix and after looking  at some reviews for H&R Block that are not great I figured I would give this office a shot.
I was very surprised at how nice the store was and how fast my taxes were done.   Although I was the first active duty member that Destiny took care of she was still thorough and asked a lot of questions.  Even the manager was very helpful and gave me 50 percent off my tax preparation!!  Attention Maxwell and Gunter don’t bother with the base just save the time by seeing Destiny and the staff at this location.  You will be well take care of

text:
Will not ever go back to file with them. I filed my taxes in February and haven't heard anything back. I went

resp.text:
Thank you for your feedback, Hope, though I apologize if there was any miscommunication regarding how the costs for this year's filing services would be deducted. It is our policy to deduct the costs of tax prep from whichever return (federal or state) is received first when the costs are deducted from your refund vs paid for up front at time of service. Regarding your anticipated refund, the quickest and most accurate source for updates on your federal refund status will continue to be the IRS 'Where's My Refund' tool available here: https://www.irs.gov/refunds

If it's been over 21 days since the IRS has accepted your return, and their 'Where's My Refund' tool doesn't reflect an updated status, we recommend reaching out to them directly for the most accurate update on your refund. They are available 7am-7pm EST Monday - Friday at 800-829-1040, though please note that hold times appear to be shorter for those calling earlier rather than later in the day. I hope the information helps to clarify on the time frame for processing, though please give us a call at 800-234-1040 if we can address any additional questions or concerns, we value the opportunity to be of service. - Jen, Jackson Hewitt Care Team

text: This place scares me. After walking in the door they were telling me things that just weren’t true. There lack of knowledge led me to walk out and go somewhere else. resp.text: Hello Jessica, I am very sorry to hear about the negative experience you had at the office as this is never the experience we want you to have. We would like to speak with you and get some additional details about your experience with our office staff, your tax return and the concern you have about the promotion. When it comes to the timing of the refund I do understand it can be frustrating waiting for the funds, but please know that we have to wait for the IRS to release funds and sometimes it is later than initially anticipated especially if there are any delays due to the PATH Act. Please give us a call at 800-234-1040 so that we can assist you in resolving your concerns. We hope to hear from you soon. -Rebecca, Jackson Hewitt Care Team

text:
I hired Profit Wise to do my business and personal account. There is still difficulty in believing the incompetence and flat-out lack of character this “firm” displayed with my accounting.

I also worked with Ms Jacqueline Harwood, who frequently would not return calls and had difficulty doing bookkeeping tasks that should have been routine.

Ms Sharon Heinz completed my tax return and said I owed over 12K in taxes. I requested a meeting to review my return with Ms Heinz. I ended up meeting with Jonathon. After going through my tax return, I ended up owing less than 2K in taxes.

Not only was I not offered an apology for the service that I received I was terminated as a client.

A first-class organization this is not. Proceed at your own risk. They will gladly collect your money beware the service.

text: This is the first year I do business with Profit Wise and for the first time I can say filing my taxes was stress free. Their employees are very welcoming (always smiling). Also when they tell you your taxes will be completed on a specific date, rest assured that they will respect you and abide by it. Jonathan was especially helpful and knowledgeable. Sharon is very professional and smart. You can tell she knows what she's doing. She's also extremely sweet and friendly which makes it a joy to do business with her. Thank you Sharon :)

text: I came to Profit wize with both my business and personal taxes because I was dissatisfied with my previous accountant. I found them to be friendly and I feel they really care about their clients. When I reviewed the returns, I was hoping I did not owe any tax but it turns out I did. So the person who worked on my taxes went back to the drawing board and found some additional credits ( I supplied him with some additional documentation). I was thrilled as he was able to get me money back on my federal return and a lower state tax bill. I feel he put in some extra effort  to make me happy. I would highly recommend them.

He signed on immediately and walked out of our consult an hour later relieved and I at ease knowing he was in good hands. Sharon and the Profit Wise team have been handling his payroll, taxes, etc for several months now and are extremely happy w/ the results.

After seeing how professional and meiticulous she had been, I moved my families personal taxes over to her as well and am extremely pleased.

If your thinking of hiring a new CPA, finding one for the first time, or just not sure.. I highly recommend a consultation with Sharon before making a decision.

name: Tammie Green
text:
-D, 4608 Avenue W, Birmingham, AL 35208.
Horrible customer service. Female workers doing too much gossip and chit chat on the sales floor. Eating Subway at their desks. Flirting with male customers. Skipping over customers waiting who have signed in to service friends they know who come in after as walk ins. Waited over an hour after signing in. Had to leave and come back. Had to wait another hour to be seen. Asked a worker who wasnt helping anyone why he wasnt able to help and he laughed at me and said he was in training. Another worker came and just sat on the phone taking calls.
